projects.name: Storehaus RTS
projects.description: A Discord bot for Halo Wars 2, Age of Empires II and IV. Get civ stats, player search, game history, and an AI strategy advisor - all from slash commands in your server.
features: Age of Empires IV: civ stats (1v1-4v4), player search, recent games via aoe4world
Age of Empires II: look up units, techs, structures, and civilizations
Halo Wars 2: AI-powered strategy answers using RAG

projects.name: Halo Quotes
projects.description: A comprehensive project featuring a website, API, and bots for displaying and sharing random quotes from the Halo video game series.
features: Social media bots (Bluesky, Twitter coming soon)

projects.name: AOE2 API
projects.description: A self-hosted Age of Empires II API that serves game metadata like civilizations, units, technologies, and structures.
features: REST API for AOE2 game data
Metadata endpoints for units, civs, and structures
